title: Multi-Grain Waffles [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
directions: Whisk dry ingredients together in a large bowl, add oil and liquid (non-dairy milk or water) and stir well to combine. It will be a thick batter.

Heat waffle iron or skillet and lightly oil. Cook batter in waffle iron on med-high heat, or proceed to make pancakes as you normally would, ladling out by the spoonful onto a seasoned skillet, flipping when bubbles appear, and cooking for 30 seconds on other side.

Top waffle or pancakes with a small spoonful coconut oil (in place of butter, yum) or jam, or fresh fruit, or crushed nuts or seeds. Drizzle with a maple syrup if desired (grade B is best, as it contains the most amount of nutrients) and devour!
ingredients: 2/3 cup all purpose gluten-free flour blend, (or whole wheat flour if not Gluten-free)
1/3 cup buckwheat flour, oat flour, quinoa flour, corn meal, etc.
1/4 cup almond meal, flax meal, hemp seeds, any ground nuts or seeds
